Class MeasurementPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.imagejdatatypes.viewer.plugins.ImageViewerPanelPlugin

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JIPipeParameterCollection, JIPipeWorkbenchAccess

    public class MeasurementPlugin
extends ImageViewerPanelPlugin
implements JIPipeParameterCollection
    Applies measurements on a drawn mask
